name: Name of the ip which will be displayed in the UI
description: Description of the ip covering the technology which will be displayed in the UI
image: URI of the image of the ip which will be displayed in the UI (decentralized storage)
externalUrl: Link to ip registration in the official ip registry

attachments.name: Name of the attachment which will be displayed in the UI
attachments.description: Description of the attachment which will be displayed in the UI
attachments.uri: URI of the attachment which will be displayed in the UI (decentralized storage)
